document.full_text: japan unveiled new plans on tuesday to contain the crisis at a crippled nuclear plant after admitting it faced greater challenges than first disclosed, but it kept to a goal of bringing the reactors under control by january.
document.title: japan keeps fukushima shutdown target despite setbacks
lines_and_colors: japan unveiled new plans on tuesday to contain the crisis at a crippled nuclear plant after admitting it faced greater challenges than first disclosed, but it kept to a goal of bringing the reactors under control by january.
